lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. S'iz gefaln a demb - we have lost a great man. The League for Yiddish mourns the passing of Eliezer Wiesel, our honorary Board member. His first book, "Un di velt hot geshvign", was published in his native Yiddish, and its adaptation into the volume "Night" introduced him to the wider world. May his support for our cause - Yiddish - inspire others. Sheva Zucker, Exec. Dir., and Gitl Schaechter- Viswanath, Chair leagueforyiddish.org 1/3
